channel.title: Boto3 on Coding Blog By Arnab Kumar Shil
channel.description: Recent content in Boto3 on Coding Blog By Arnab Kumar Shil

item.title: Do Extra in S3 Using Django Storage and Boto3
item.description: Today, I am going to write about few useful snippets/functionalities which I have used for Amazon S3 or any S3 compitable storage using Boto3 and Django Storage. FYI, this post focuses on using S3 with Django. So without further ado, let us begin. Table of contents  Configuring S3 Using S3 which it does not belong to AWS Serve S3 in different domain(through cloudFront or varnish) Create new bucket See all buckets Change access control to a bucket Delete objects from a bucket(also bucket itself) Use different folders when storing media and static contents Make ‘collect static’ faster Check ACL status In conclusion
